casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. MCDOUGALD
v.
GREENE 2019-0277 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 26, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On relator's "motion for leave to supplement writ of mandamus with following facts." Sua sponte, respondent ordered to submit for in camera inspection unredacted copies of all records requested by relator in this case. Records shall be submitted under seal within 14 days.
